title: Run bun loop and fix first blocker
description: Execute tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, apply minimal fix for first failure trigger, verify via loop rerun, commit.

title: Ensure bun_loop writes summary on failure
description: Modify tools/bun_loop.sh so failed brew install still produces logs/bun/summary-*.txt (avoid set -e early exit), then continue loop parsing.

title: Bun loop: guard first network trigger
description: Run bun_loop, capture first network activity trigger, patch minimal guard/switch to prevent it, verify with next loop run, commit.

title: bun: fix first network-trigger report
description: Run bun loop, identify first trigger in latest summary, apply minimal guard/fix, verify, commit.

title: Bun loop: fix first blocker from latest run
description: Run bun loop, patch minimal fix for first blocker only, verify with rerun, commit.

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, apply minimal surgical fix for first blocker, verify with rerun, commit.

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, and apply one minimal fix for the first reported blocker with verification and commit.

title: Bun loop: patch first current blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, fix only first blocker with minimal patch, verify, commit, close.

title: Bun loop: patch first fresh blocker
description: Run bun_loop, fix first failing blocker only, verify and commit

title: bun: prototype unblock first BoringSSL blocker
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure only (expected BuildBoringSSL register_repository under bootstrap-off), verify, commit.

title: Bun loop: fix next first blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch only the first failure cause in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify with loop rerun and Homebrew checks, commit and close task.

title: Bun loop: fix first BuildCares blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch first failure only, verify, commit.

title: Bun loop: resolve first blocker after BuildHighway
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, identify first failure trigger, apply minimal formula-centric patch for that single blocker, verify with rerun/checks, commit, close task.

title: Bun loop: resolve first BuildLibDeflate blocker
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure only, verify and commit one atomic change.

title: Bun loop: resolve next first blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch only first failure cause minimally, verify, commit, close

title: bun: prototype use system lshpack
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, identify first blocker at BuildLshpack.cmake, apply minimal Formula/b/bun.rb patch to avoid repository download under bootstrap-off, rerun and verify.

title: bun loop: handle first post-lshpack blocker
description: Run bun_loop, patch first blocker only in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit, close task

title: Bun loop: resolve next first blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch only first failure in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit, and close.

title: Bun loop: handle BuildLibArchive first blocker
description: Run bun loop, fix only first BuildLibArchive blocker in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify with loop/style/audit, commit and close.

title: Bun loop: fix next first blocker
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure cause only in bun formula, verify with loop/style/audit, commit, close task, emit build.done

title: Bun loop: fix next first blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, implement one minimal Formula/b/bun.rb fix for first blocker, verify, commit, close, emit build.done.

title: Bun loop: fix next first blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch only first blocker in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit.

title: bun loop: handle first blocker after system zig
description: Run bun loop, patch first blocker minimally in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit, close task.

title: Bun loop: fix first blocker after system esbuild
description: Run bun_loop, patch first failure only in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit

title: Bun: unblock bun-error preact imports
description: One atomic loop iteration: resolve first Bun blocker where esbuild cannot resolve preact/preact-hooks/preact-jsx-runtime during bun-error build under bootstrap-off constraints with minimal Formula/b/bun.rb change.

title: Bun loop: fix first current blocker
description: Run bun loop, patch first blocker minimally in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit, close task, emit build.done

title: Bun loop: resolve first blocker from latest run
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect newest summary, patch minimal first blocker only, validate, commit.

title: Bun loop: fix first post-bootstrap blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect latest summary, resolve only the first blocker, validate (style/audit/build evidence), commit, and close task.

title: bun: clear first blocker from latest bun_loop run
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, fix only first bun v1.3.8 source-build blocker in Formula/b/bun.rb, validate style/audit, commit atomically.

title: bun: clear first blocker from latest bun_loop run
description: Run bun loop, patch first blocker minimally in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit.

title: bun: expose JSCJSValue.h for source build
description: Resolve first bun_loop compile blocker by minimally patching Formula/b/bun.rb to provide JavaScriptCore/JSCJSValue.h, then verify with bun_loop/style/audit and commit.

title: Bun: patch ExceptionHelpers include path
description: Resolve first Bun v1.3.8 source-build blocker (missing JavaScriptCore/ExceptionHelpers.h) with minimal Formula/b/bun.rb patch, verify bun_loop/style/audit, and commit atomically.

title: bun: unblock JSBase.h header path
description: Resolve first bun_loop compile blocker: JSHeapFinalizerPrivate.h cannot find JSBase.h by minimally adjusting WebKit header include pathing in Formula/b/bun.rb; verify with bun_loop, brew style, and brew audit --strict bun.

title: bun: fix GCIncomingRefCountedInlines include
description: Resolve first bun_loop source-build blocker: missing JavaScriptCore/GCIncomingRefCountedInlines.h by applying a minimal Formula/b/bun.rb compatibility/include-path patch, then verify with bun_loop + style + audit and commit atomically.

description: Resolve first bun_loop compile blocker for JavaScriptCore/HeapInlines.h via minimal Formula/b/bun.rb patch and verify style/audit.

title: bun: fix IdentifierInlines include compatibility
description: Address first bun_loop compile blocker for JavaScriptCore/IdentifierInlines.h not found via minimal Formula/b/bun.rb patch

title: Bun: shim JSArrayBufferViewInlines include
description: Reproduce first blocker with tools/bun_loop.sh and apply minimal Formula/b/bun.rb compatibility rewrite for JavaScriptCore/JSArrayBufferViewInlines.h include path, then verify and commit.

title: bun: shim JSCJSValueInlines include
description: Resolve current first compile blocker in JSCInlines.h for JavaScriptCore/JSCJSValueInlines.h via minimal Formula/b/bun.rb compatibility rewrite and verify blocker movement

title: bun: prototype DFGAbstractHeap include shim
description: Resolve first compile blocker after JSCJSValueInlines: missing DFGAbstractHeap.h via DOMJITEffect.h with minimal formula-only patch, then rerun bun_loop + style/audit + commit.

title: bun: prototype JSCellInlines include shim
description: Resolve current first compile blocker in JSCInlines.h by applying minimal Formula-only include compatibility rewrite for JSCellInlines, then verify with bun_loop/style/audit and commit one atomic change.

title: bun: unblock JSFunctionInlines include
description: Resolve first bun build failure in JSCInlines.h for missing JavaScriptCore/JSFunctionInlines.h via minimal Formula-only compatibility patch; verify blocker moves; run style/audit; commit atomically.

title: bun: shim JSGlobalObjectInlines include
description: Reproduce first blocker with tools/bun_loop.sh, patch minimal Formula-only include rewrite for JSGlobalObjectInlines, verify blocker moves, run style/audit, commit.

title: bun: shim JSObjectInlines include
description: Resolve first compile blocker in JSCInlines.h by rewriting JavaScriptCore/JSObjectInlines.h include to flat header include in Formula/b/bun.rb, then verify loop advancement and run style/audit.

title: bun: shim JSGlobalProxy include
description: Patch Formula/b/bun.rb to rewrite JavaScriptCore/JSGlobalProxy.h include in JSCInlines.h, verify first blocker advances, run style/audit, commit atomically.

title: bun: prototype JSString include shim
description: Resolve first blocker in JSCInlines.h by rewriting JavaScriptCore/JSString.h include to flat private header in Formula/b/bun.rb, then verify via tools/bun_loop.sh and run style/audit checks.

title: Bun: fix next JSC include blocker

title: bun: rewrite ThrowScope include
description: Run bun loop, fix first JSC include blocker only, verify style/audit/loop, commit

title: bun: rewrite WeakGCMapInlines include
